text: Tuberothelais flavolineata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Tuberothelais. It was described by Breuning in 1963.Biolib.cz - Tuberothelais flavolineata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1963
title: Tuberothelais flavolineata
